title: It's not that Thunderlord's is "2 gud"
body:
It's that the other masteries are just weak in comparison. 

When a support is taking Thunderlord's, you need to ask yourself: ***Is it because Support keystones are weak, or Thunderlord's is too strong?*** Currently the only really support oriented high level keystone is Windspeaker's, and that's only for the ones with shields and heals. If we can provide more keystone masteries to champions who need them, we're going to see less Thunderlord's. Why? Because Thunderlord's is the best choice ***FOR PEOPLE THAT DON'T HAVE A CHOICE.***

Don't nerf Thunderlord's. Because a year from now when we have 10 more keystone masteries, it's going to need buffs. And if we leave it the way it is now, a year from now we'll say "gosh, remember how dumb people were back in the day when they went for Thunderlord's?" then someone with a brain will say "nah it's only because they didn't have a choice." Choice is what we need, not nerfs.
